traits.name: Axiomatic Mind
entries: The decaton can't be compelled to act in a manner contrary to its nature or its instructions.

traits.name: Combat Ready
entries: The decaton has advantage on initiative rolls.

traits.name: Disintegration
entries: If the decaton dies, its body disintegrates into dust, leaving behind anything it was carrying.

actions.name: Multiattack
entries: The decaton makes three Tentacle attacks.

actions.name: Tentacle
entries: Melee atk +7 to hit, reach 10 ft., one target. 15 (2d10 + 4 damage) piercing damage, and if the target is a Medium or smaller creature, it has the {@condition grappled} condition (escape DC 14). Until this grapple ends, the decaton can't use this tentacle against other targets. The decaton has ten tentacles, each of which can grapple one target.

actions.name: Lightning Rays {@recharge}
entries: The decaton unleashes a barrage of lightning bolts from its eyes. Each creature within 30 feet of the decaton must make a DC 13 Dexterity saving throw, taking 38 (7d10 damage) lightning damage on a failed save, or half as much damage on a successful save.

spellcasting.name: Spellcasting
headerEntries: The decaton casts one of the following spells, requiring no material components and using Intelligence as the spellcasting ability (spell save {@dc 13}):
